subject: Self Care
title: Lucid Dreaming
description: A short lesson to help you apply Lucid Dreaming.

hook.text: Imagine knowing you're in a dream and choosing what happens next. Lucid dreamers do this regularly.

buildup.text: In a lucid dream, the prefrontal cortex â€” normally offline during sleep â€” partially reactivates.

discovery.text: About 55% of people experience at least one lucid dream. Frequent lucid dreamers are much rarer.

twist.text: Lucid dreaming isn't always fun. Some people experience sleep paralysis or disrupted rest as a side effect.

climax.text: Scientists study lucid dreaming to understand consciousness itself. Being aware in sleep blurs the line.

punchline.text: Lucid dreams reveal where sleep and awareness collide.
